critique: The document is a simple extension of a trust period for the Kickapoo Band of Indians. There is no strong emotional language used. As the President, I would hope to elicit a sense of joy and perhaps reduce any fear or sadness related to the expiration of the trust. Surprise and disgust are unlikely to be relevant here.Initial scores: Joy: 3, Sadness: 2, Anger: 1, Fear: 2, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1.Revised scores: Joy: 4, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1.
